events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product has several scratches and seems defective. I am quite disappointed as I expected a new item.
The reported issue has been categorized as a product defect due to the customer's description mentioning scratches and damage.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specialized in handling product defects and damages.
Hello! I am sorry to hear about the scratches on your item. Let me assist you in resolving this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged areas and confirm whether you would prefer a replacement or a refund?
I have attached pictures showing the scratches clearly. A replacement would be my preference since I still want the product in good condition.
Thank you for the photos. We will send you a replacement immediately and provide a prepaid label to return the defective product at no cost.
That sounds good to me. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the replacement soon.
Your replacement shipment has been dispatched today, and the return label was emailed. Please let us know once you have sent the defective item back.
We are checking in to confirm you have received your replacement and that everything is satisfactory with the new product.
Yes, I received the replacement yesterday. It is in perfect condition and I’m very happy with how this was handled.
We are glad to hear you’re satisfied with your replacement. We are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.
A short survey has been sent to you to gather feedback about your support experience. We appreciate your time in helping us improve.
